text: The Real Estate and Construction, is a functional constituency in the elections for the Legislative Council of Hong Kong first created in 1998. The constituency is composed of the members of the Real Estate Developers Association of Hong Kong, Hong Kong Construction Association, and Hong Kong E&M; Contractors' Association to vote at general meetings of the Associations.http://clic.org.hk/hk/legis/en/ord/542/s20n.html ==References== Category:Functional constituencies of Hong Kong
title: Real Estate and Construction (constituency)
